title: Impeachment Probe Pushes Schiff to Center Stage
text:
WASHINGTON—Since last week, President Trump has called him a disgrace, a lying disaster and a fraud, labeling him “Shifty Schiff” and saying he’s not fit to hold a cabinet member’s “blank-strap.” Mr. Trump’s personal lawyer has threatened to sue him. House Republicans are pushing for a vote on a resolution to hold him in contempt.

House Intelligence Committee Chairman Adam Schiff (D., Calif.) has been a target for Republicans for years, since he led the charge in Congress to probe potential contacts between the Kremlin and...
description: When he touched off an impeachment inquiry last month, Adam Schiff assumed a nationwide profile as the top enemy of Republicans and became a hero to many Democrats.
